biography: Born 1956 in Fukuoka. Graduated from Kyushu University of Art and Design. Studied under Matsumoto Toshio during college years, learnt about experimental films. Professor of Kyoto University of Art and Design. Major works are SPACY (81), THUNDER (82), MONOCHROME HEAD (97), DIZZINESS (01), A SILENT DAY (02)
name: Takashi Ito
